item.title: Added 2 new services.
item.description:
https://www.ntaskmanager.com/ - Project management software that enables your teams tn collaborate, plan, analyze and manage everyday tasks. Basic Plan free forever with 100 MB storage, 5 users/team. Unlimited workspaces, meetings,tasks, timesheets and issue tracking.
https://storj.io - Decentralised Private Cloud Storage for Apps and Developers. Free plan provides 3 Projects, 50 GB storage per project/month , 50 GB bandwidth per project/month.

item.title: Add Scraper's Proxy
item.description: https://scrapersproxy.com) — Simple HTTP proxy API made for scraping. Scrape anonymously without having to worry about restrictions, blocks or captchas. First 100 successfully scrape's per month free including javascript rendering (more available if you contact support - — Simple HTTP proxy API made for scraping. Scrape anonymously without having to worry about restrictions, blocks or captchas. item.title: Move onto one line
item.description: https://codeberg.page/ - Unlimited public and private Git repos for free and open-source projects. Static website hosting with [Codeberg Pages](https://codeberg.page/).

item.title: Add Codeberg Pages and update description
item.description:
https://codeberg.org/ - Unlimited public and private Git repos for free and open-source projects.
https://codeberg.page/ - hosting with [Codeberg Pages](https://codeberg.page/).

item.title: Update redirected link
item.description: https://devpal.co/base64-decode/ - — Online free tool for decoding & encoding data.

item.title: Add Operous.dev to Security Tools
item.description: https://operous.dev/ - Cloud instance testing tool with a comprehensive and automated set of test-suites of best practices, performance, and security. Free tier offers 100 testing minutes, 10 Test Suites, and up to 5 instances to 1 user.

item.title: Add Mastershot video editor
item.description: https://mastershot.app - Completely free browser-based video editor. No watermark, up to 1080p export options.

item.title: Update Okteto Cloud Free plan
item.description: https://okteto.com - - Managed Kubernetes service designed for remote development. Free developer accounts come with 5 Kubernetes namespaces, 3Gi/pod with a maximum of 8Gi/namespace, 1CPU/pod with a maximum of 4CPUs/namespace and 5GB Disk space. The apps sleep after 24 hours of inactivity.

item.title: Added reCaptchaMe
item.description: https://recaptchame.com/ - free reCAPTCHA and hCAPTCHA backend service. No Server-Side coding needed. Works for static websites.

item.title: Update WebScraping.AI Monthly Limit
item.description: https://webscraping.ai - Simple Web Scraping API with built-in parsing, Chrome rendering and proxies. 2000 free API calls per month.
